topic.title: Merger feature documentation
topic.body:
Is there a plan to add the merger feature to the documentation?

It would be nice to have a zeronet version of the docs as well... it's easy to get used to knowing then a site was updated or not :)

topic.title: How to avoid Cross-Origin blocking?

2_137PNA5gLgCTLZTBtzUqCmMoZ752NQGQSJ.body:
> [waterrabbit](#comment_29_1LxkfGxtWhktAJ5WJ9ZnKxksTSH37qm8cC): <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">
> 
> 
> <link href="./css/font-awesome-4.0.3.css" rel="stylesheet" crossorigin="anonymous">
> 
> 
> Have a try...

I've added that to the index file all.css include and got the error about the css instead of the font files:

```
CSS stylesheet from origin 'http://*:43110' has been blocked from loading by Cross-Origin Resource Sharing policy: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource. Origin 'null' is therefore not allowed access.
```

I've used:

```
      <meta name="referrer" content="no-referrer">
      <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/all.css" crossorigin="anonymous">
```
